action.primary: Warms the Spleen and Stomach, descends Qi and relieves hiccups

indications: Hiccups, belching, abdominal distention and vomiting from Stomach Deficiency and Cold

action.primary: Supplements Kidney Qi and Assists Yang

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with hiccups due to Stomach Heat.

notes: This herb is mild and must be combined with other herbs for maximum effectiveness.
This herb has a mild Kidney Yang tonifying effect and should be combined with other Kidney tonics to treat low back pain caused by Kidney Yang Deficiency.
